title: Pet Cafe
description: Pet Cafe is a simulation game where every visitor can surround himself with various animals and pay you. Buy a wide selection of animals, from affectionate kittens and puppies to woolly sheep, and also buy seats for visitors. Take care of the animals by feeding them, shower them, and let them sleep so they will be happy and healthy all the time. The happier the animals are, the more visitors your cafe will attract.
